pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.1: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.2: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.3: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.6: methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti, sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti, catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ, sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.2: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.5: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.7: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.10: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe…. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.1: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.2: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.4: anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.1: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajati, sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ, sattannaṁ, samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.2: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.7: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.10: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca. #2
